Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game.java - called in Main#main() where the main game play takes place after the options have been selected by the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int numPlayers, int numCards, int numTheme)
      Constructor method for the game class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cardCount()
      Print number of cards in each player hand.
      void dealCards()
      Deals the cards out to each player.
      void findWinner(int i)
      Finds the winning player and adds losing players' cards to the back of winner's hand.
      void gamePlay()
      The sequence of steps in each players' turn.
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> generateDeck(int numCards)
      Generates a deck of cards.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> generatePlayers(int numOpponents)
      Generates the arraylist of players.
      int getNumAttribute(int i)
      Returns the index number of the attribute the player has selected.
      void printAttributes(int i)
      Prints the attribute value for each player.
      void printCard(int i)
      Print current player's top card.
      void removePlayers()
      Implemented ListIterator to remove players when they have 0 cards in their hand and print when they have ran out of cards.
      void run()
      Runs the game loop.

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the game loop. Calls Game#generatePlayers() Game#generateDeck() dealCards() gamePlay()

      • gamePlay

        public void gamePlay()
        The sequence of steps in each players' turn. Calls cardCount() Game#printCard() Player.takeInput() Game#printAttributes() Game#findWinner() removePlayers()

      • removePlayers

        public void removePlayers()
        Implemented ListIterator to remove players when they have 0 cards in their hand and print when they have ran out of cards.
